entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
